summary:
okay so heres my hot take on this. 
i dont think spamming phil with questions abt dan is right. def fucking not. and i dont...
body:
okay so heres my hot take on this.

i dont think spamming phil with questions abt dan is right. def fucking not. and i dont think that either should be pressured to upload as they have already addressed that. but, i dont think theres any harm in general if we ask when is dapg probably gonna come back. both of them know that the majority of us arent assholes and literally want them to just be happy and trust me they are aware of that. dan said in the mukbang vid to phil that “i think they just want to see us happy”. and thats totally true. but i think its also inevitable that people are gonna ask phil about dan or joint content. and tbh i did not and would not ask phil abt dan just because id rather not full stop but if someone does i dont think its that big of a problem. at the end of the day everyone in this phandom is in it for both of them. and its not like they are not aware of that. they have presented themselves as a unit as far as what we have been given. and if they no longer want that obvs fucking respect. but they need to tell us or show us in some way that that has changed for people to stop expecting “joint content” as much as before. also i dont think phil would really be bothered abt it. neither will dan, dan literally joked about it as his april fools joke and thanked us for our continued support. as for phil he literally loves dan i dont think he didnt expect such questions in the first place. he will probably just take the ones he wants to answer for his video and move on. (also i dont see how this is different than lots of people tweeting at them whenever either of them tweets asking about joint content or dan, i think its actually more respectful to ask when there is an ask box there)

okay so heres my hot take on this.

i dont think spamming phil with questions abt dan is right. def fucking not. and i dont think that either should be pressured to upload as they have already addressed that. but, i dont think theres any harm in general if we ask when is dapg probably gonna come back. both of them know that the majority of us arent assholes and literally want them to just be happy and trust me they are aware of that. dan said in the mukbang vid to phil that “i think they just want to see us happy”. and thats totally true. but i think its also inevitable that people are gonna ask phil about dan or joint content. and tbh i did not and would not ask phil abt dan just because id rather not full stop but if someone does i dont think its that big of a problem. at the end of the day everyone in this phandom is in it for both of them. and its not like they are not aware of that. they have presented themselves as a unit as far as what we have been given. and if they no longer want that obvs fucking respect. but they need to tell us or show us in some way that that has changed for people to stop expecting “joint content” as much as before. also i dont think phil would really be bothered abt it. neither will dan, dan literally joked about it as his april fools joke and thanked us for our continued support. as for phil he literally loves dan i dont think he didnt expect such questions in the first place. he will probably just take the ones he wants to answer for his video and move on. summary: Dan tweeting every few days is like a fly buzzing near my ear but instead of buzzing it’s humming “Stayin’ Alive”
